oracle.apps.saf.ta.jaudit.core
Class ErrorReporter

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.saf.ta.jaudit.core.ErrorReporter

public class ErrorReporter
extends java.lang.Object

Used to report unexpected errors during audit processing. This class should be the only way errors are reported.
